text: So when Saul departed with the forces, he said, "God will certainly test you through a river, so whoever drinks from it then he is not of me and whoever does not taste of it, then certainly he is of me, except he who takes in the hollow of his hand," but they drank from it except a few of them. Then when he had crossed (the river) with those who believed with him, they said, "Today we do not have power against Goliath and his forces." Those who expected that they would meet God, said, "How often has a small party over come a party consisting of many people by the order of God, and God is with those who are patient
